content:
We have two important items for this week's OO on FHIR Call Agenda for Tuesday Oct 9 2PM EASTERN TIME:. See the Conference Call Calender for details:

  • A block vote: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/103-Orders-and.20Observation.20WG/subject/Block.20Vote.20for.20Normative.20Observation.20Ballot.20Items.3A/near/194981
  • GF#18152

If you want any of these pulled for discussion let me know right away, since all normative reconciliation must be complete in less than 2 weeks.
Normative reconciliation is due in less than 1 week - Friday is the last day to vote
